definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Council on Foreign Relations (US policy think tank)
pinyin: Wai4 jiao1 Guan1 xi4 Li3 shi4 hui4

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知识产权已经成为外交外贸领域的重要议题。

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 总理委派外交部长作为他的代表。

sentences.english: The President's envoy to the conference has not yet been chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总统的外交使节参加会议尚未被选中。

sentences.english: The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.
sentences.chinese: 两国外交关系已经断绝。

sentences.english: Summary: What does rise of the Tea Party movement mean for U.
sentences.chinese: 茶党运动的兴起对美国外交政策意味着什么呢？

sentences.english: China emphasizes a hands-off foreign policy towards the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国强调不干涉他国内政的外交政策。
李导游对此倒是一副外交辞令。

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: We cannot settle this problem by diplomacy and suaveness alone.
sentences.chinese: 光靠外交和文雅我们不能解决这个问题。

sentences.english: He will deputize for the foreign minister.
What follows from that is up to the diplomats to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，就全由外交官来处理了。

sentences.english: We must fight the urge to revamp our diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须极力修补我们的外交关系。

sentences.english: He started his official career as a diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 他从当外交官起开始了他的从政生涯。

sentences.english: The fortune of the young diplomat began to wane.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻外交官开始倒运了。

sentences.english: Finally, it discussed the important history position of it.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论述了王稼祥的外交思想的重要历史地位。

sentences.english: The Foreign Ministry supports the sale, since it believes it will improve Israeli-Russian relations.
sentences.chinese: 外交部同意该军售，因为这会改善俄以关系。

definition: Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
